message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident it has significant potential value for the right buyer.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a great price considering the product's potential. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
